thread.title: Air France-KLM passenger traffic rises 1.4% - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: Air France-KLM passenger traffic rises 1.4% - MarketWatch

author: Inti Landauro
title: Air France-KLM passenger traffic rises 1.4% - MarketWatch
text:
PARIS--Air France-KLM (AF.FR) on Wednesday reported a 1.4% year-over-year rise in the number of passengers carried in August, boosted by traffic on long-haul routes and Air France's budget airline Transavia.
Air France-KLM said total passenger traffic last month was 8.7 million. Long-haul traffic rose 2.9% from a year ago, while traffic at Transavia rose 1.1%.
Load factor, a measure of how full the planes are, rose by 0.7 percentage point to 90.1%.
The Franco-Dutch carrier's cargo activity deteriorated last month. Cargo traffic fell 8.9% in August from a year ago. The load factor in the cargo division fell 0.8 percentage point to 57.9%.
